name: The Last Treat
description:
The Last TreatAn atmospheric first person shooter / walking simulator :)

In this short story you play as a kid that is late for Halloween. With all your friends already gone home you want to get some sweets but nobody has a treat for you. Wait. Nobody? What's with that spooky manor over there? Did you hear that voice? Go! Get yourself the last treat!

Play with mouse and keyboard or with your gamepad!

Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.
